members.member: Set the B-format audio files (split into two stereo files)
Play AudioClip as a one shot sound
Play AudioClip as a one shot sound, with a gain modifier
Play assigned AudioClip after a delay
Play assigned AudioClip
Stop playback
Pause playback
Toggle reverb zones -- the ambi array responds to Unity's reverb zones.
Get/Set Output Audio Mixer Channel
Toggle play on awake
Toggle bypass listener effects
Toggle mute
Toggle loop
Toggle audio volume
Get/set the pitch of the ambi array
Get and set YZ AudioClip to playback
Get and set WX AudioClip to playback
Get and set playback position in seconds
Get and set playback position in samples
Get audio playback status
Get and set the amount of high frequency reflections, clamped between 0 and 1. 1 is maximum high frequencies.
Get and set overall amplitude of room reflections, clamped between 0 and 5 (linear gain)
Get and set the amplutide of reflections off the right wall
Get and set the amplutide of reflections off the front wall
Get and set the amplutide of reflections off the left wall
Get and set the amplutide of reflections off the back wall
Get and set the amplutide of reflections off the floor
Get and set the amplutide of reflections off the ceiling
Get and set the size of the diffuse zone. This is the area around the room where the reflections gradually diffuse and die out.
Show/hide the room guides
Get and set the room's pivot point (0 = corner, 1 = centre)
Set/get room reflection presets
Get/set minimum distance. The distance after which the attenuation effect begins. Use this to control the 'size' of the sound.
Get/set maximum distance. In log mode, it is the distance after which attenuation stops. In linear mode, it is the distance at which the source is inaudible.
Toggle maximum distance mute -- the distance after which the source is muted.
Get/Set distance roll-off factor. Only applicable in logarithmic attenuation mode. A higher value results in a steeper attenuation curve. Default is 1 (6dB with doubling of distance).
Toggle room modelling.
Toggle doppler and delayed time of flight. Enabling this will disable Unity's doppler.
Get/set the intensity of the doppler effect
Get/set input channel selection
Get/set TBE_Room prefab object in the scene. Applicable only if auto detection of rooms is disabled.
Toggle auto detection of rooms
Toggle spatialization
Get/set source panner type
Get/set room panner type
Get/Set the attenuation mode for the source (3Dcpetion's attenuation modes or Unity's attenuation curve)
If attenuationMode is set to custom, this sets the custom attenuation gain value
Returns auto-detected room ID
